title: Determine if the reaction is spontaneous at 298K
text: To determine if this reaction is spontaneous at 298K, consider the sign of the standard Gibbs free energy change (∆G°).

title: Understanding Gibbs Free Energy
text: Recall that a negative value for ΔG° indicates a spontaneous reaction under standard conditions.

title: Compare ΔG° value
text: Given that $$ΔG\degree=\frac{-32.89kJ}{mol}$$. Is the value negative? If yes, the reaction is spontaneous.

title: Make your conclusion
text: Based on the given Gibbs free energy change (ΔG°=-32.89kJ/mol), is the reaction spontaneous?
